document_data.name: ''Destroyer of the Hills''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Destroyer of the Hills''''' was a unique ''[[girdle of bluntness]]'' that earned its name from the exploits of its original owner.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of the girdle was given significant protection from attacks that sought to [[:Category:Bludgeoning weapons|bludgeon]] or crush an individual.
document_data.History:
It was first worn by [[Garrar|Garrar the Powerful]], a man whose homeland was overrun by [[hill giant]]s. With the girdle's magic protection, he drove the foul [[giant]]s from his home, off to neighboring lands that were not as fortunateâ€”thus the ''Destroyer of the Hills'' earned its name.

At some time during or before the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, the girdle came into the possession of a [[bandit]] named [[Caldo]].
